summary:
We need to produce JSON with summary, business_intent, keywords list.

We have class XRaySegment. Docstring describes that XRay is request oriented, middleware marks start of a segment, stays open during request, subsegments may be generated, at request end middleware stops segment, emitted via UDP. During testing we need to control start and end via context managers. Methods __enter__ and __exit__ are standard magic methods.

So summary: class provides context manager to manually start and stop X-Ray tracing segment for testing, encapsulating segment lifecycle.

Business intent: enable developers to manage AWS X-Ray tracing segments in code, especially for testing, ensuring proper start and end of trace segments.

Keywords: X-Ray, tracing, segment, context manager, testing, middleware, request lifecycle, AWS, subsegments, UDP emission, __enter__, __exit__.
